name: Sneaky Kitty
description:
Stefan is evil!

He wants you to bathe *le gasp*

Better teach him a lesson and wreck the house!

But don't let him catch you!

Controls:

WASD to move

Space to jump

Shift to run

Mouse to look around

Made by:

Gijs Westerdijk (Programming)

Jasper Blank (Level Design)

Jeffrey van Velzen (Music/Sound Design)
